nodes.text: The Abduction is an adventure for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game published in 1992 by West End Games. (The book's spine and all interior pages give the title as The Abduction of Crying Dawn Singer; only the front cover uses the truncated title.) It was reprinted in Classic Adventures, under the full title.
In this adventure, Rebel agents have to rescue a kidnapped Shashay celebrity, Crying Dawn Singer to avoid the Alliance being discredited in Rayter sector.
